translations: 矮牵牛花；喇叭花（petunia 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Pound those petunias, you striped stem-suckers!
sentences.translation: 冲向那些牵牛花条纹勇士们！

sentences.sentence: This is when geraniums and petunias come into their own.
sentences.translation: 这是天竺葵和矮牵牛盛开的时节。 。

sentences.sentence: While watching passersby, she sits on bench next to a fountain, purple rhododendrons, and a bed of petunias.
sentences.translation: 她坐在长椅上看著人来人往，而旁边就是喷泉、紫色的杜鹃花与牵牛花圃。
